attributes.review: Terrible application. I literally needed to buy a brand new phone because this phone gave me a HUGE virus. I recommend no one uses it without having an extra couple hundred dollars to buy a brand new phone. It was also full of ads and miserable content. I can’t believe trump released this!!
attributes.title: My phone died

attributes.review: I used this app and when I did my phone started to glitch horribly typing random stuff I think I was being hacked it’s a HORRIBLE APP this app just doesn’t deserve to be on the App Store if it will glitch this bad if I could rate this lower I would like this app may of gotten my phone hacked would never recommend
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app I was cursed with bad luck. Right after I got it both my dogs died! Then the next day I was attracted my a orange cat! I believe it was trump in cat form. then just today when i woke up everything is orange!!! i can’t believe my eyes!!! trust me don’t get this app it is a danger to society! plz i am warning you 😾😾😾
attributes.title: this app is cursed

attributes.review: THIS APP CRASHED MY PHONE!!!! I had to completely re start my phone, not just shut it down, RESTART IT! All my pictures were gone all my memories were gon!!! 😭😭😭😫😫😩 I HAD REALLLLYYY IMPORTANT THINGS! I lost my job because of this app!!! I had a very important meeting and everything set up on my phone, IT WAS ALL GONE! If I could give this app a negative 20 stars I WOULD!!!! 😭😫
attributes.title: OMG WHY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!😭😭😭😭😭😩😩😩😖

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible I was trying to support trump for the “good” president that he is and when I opened the app I was attacked by flying baby trumps they just kept chanting “make America great” and then Donald trump and his secret service tried getting me to rate this app 5 stars which I disagreed they tried to attack me so I escaped and rated 1 star wish I could rate .5stars
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I am here appalled at what people have said about the president these children not knowing what they’re talking about. We all know we’re here to make American great once again... to the days before this app was a thing. Y’all my phone keeps glitching and I think it’s the universe once again reminding me that he eint schet.
attributes.title: As a true American

attributes.review: Don’t download this app! When I first opened it, it started glitching my phone and then crashed. Next thing I know, my phone started acting up and all of my data was deleted. This app gives you viruses. Not only is he allowing more corona virus but also for phones 😮 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: VIRUS

attributes.review: This app is trash. Every time I open the app it attracts boomers! This is not ok! It’s like a cult! They keep saying “all hail the orange man" Like, what’s up with that? Also I’ve had many other people show up to my door that I will not name (for obvious reasons.) why do they keep coming to my door? IDK. But what I do know is that it has something to do with the app.
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: This app is God awful. As soon as I downloaded the app, my phone began slowing down. I got this app two months ago and I had to go fix my phone four times during that time. There were multiple VIRUSES on my phone slowing it down. There’s a glitch on the app that takes your money without your permission as well. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: i can’t even believe this app was made. it took 3 MONTHS to download and when i downloaded it, it put a virus on my phone that cost THOUSANDS of dollars to get rid of. the app made a terrible loud noise when you opened it and the first thing you saw when you opened the app was a cheeto standing in front of the white house. it’s a scam
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
